title: Sri Lanka appoints panel to address slow container release from Customs
byline: Importers say the container release has slowed in the past few months

title: German 'stability pelican' Helmut Schlesinger dies amid calls to return to Deutsche Mark
byline: He was a key person to develop a credible anchor for the D-Mark after US macroeconomists broke the Bretton Woods

title: Sri Lanka's PMB style SOE fails to control soaring rice prices in Bolivia
byline: The State Food Production Support Company was selling rice without profits but was unable to make an impact
